title: If League of Legends was a Romantic Comedy

embed.description: This is what a League of Legends romantic comedy would look like. Starring Jinx and Ekko.

body:
I got requested to make a video showing League of Legends as a Romantic Comedy Movie trailer. So here it Is.

Let me know what you want me to make next.

If you guys like these I will continue making another one.

Enjoy!

Obeejuan

Edit: Part 3 on Boards "If league was an action movie"
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/snYIseRN-if-league-of-legends-was-an-action-movie

replies.body:
"Meet Ekko" 

"He's Bronze V" xD

I really enjoyed the second bit. It made me chuckle and smile a few times. I think the video/shot choices at that part were great. 

Overall... I thought it was...

http://imgur.com/M3GmJNo

A couple of things to watch moving forward tho... 

The text at the end goes over Jinx's face. It's a bit distracting. Bring the "The" down with the "impossible" and your golden.

Watch the consistency with the fades and text. Jinx had her titles exiting and entering on a beat instantly, while Ekko's had a fade/wipe at the end (For bonus points, add an outline to text!)

I would've also liked to see a bit more of Ekko as well towards the end, since the "movie" seemed to be about the both of them.

Otherwise, neat idea! I think the songs were better this time around too ^^

Also Also, what program are you using to edit these? :3

Thank You for the tips! Yeah there is definitely some 4am type of mistakes in there ;) 

I'm just using good old Premiere Pro.
10/10 would watch
A romance cartoon movie. I dont think that has been done before, excluding anime ;P
DO A KIDS MOVIE
id rather it be targeted to teens.
Upvote this, awesome idea.
I am impressed, that turned out better then i expected.  Now Riot just needs to make it happen.
Thanks! I was not expecting it to work at all either honestly haha

I really enjoyed it. I would say that the music was a bit loud and it made it hard to hear, example would be right in the beginning when Jinx is talking about all the things she has to do today, that was hard to hear.

I would really like to see a League of Legends Horror movie.  :)  Keep up the good work though!
Yeah I have a tendency to play my music extremely loud. Especially when I game!
Fair enough.  lol
How about League of legends as a spy film?
Yeah just did a 007 League one. Its on the Boards!
If league was a war movie ;)
Haha, isnt it that already.

> [{quoted}](name=obeejuan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=02vpfUd2,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-01-06T04:02:57.187+0000)
>
> Haha, isnt it that already.

I see it currently more so as a soap opera, but probably just me xD
This was more OP than on-release {{champion:38}} , good job! :D
Thanks! just made another one
Nice! I thought this wouldn't be that good due to how challanging it would be to make it, but you dun did well!
Yeah that was a bit of a challenge. I was wondering what I got myself into, but at least something came out haha
I would like it if you made a long almost movie like video (you know, like 45 minutes long) that had much of the cinemas of LoL in chrono order to make sense of lore
Hmm interesting. I would have to figure out how to do that but it would be awesome to see.

I am such a fan of your vids and so glad u responded. I rlly wish maybe u just animate it by yourself... kinda like how they do Helmet Bro but i know you can do it better.

I dont care how long it takes but pls just make something close to that
Thank you! I would love to animate something like that. Would take me awhile but I'd love to do it.
Like a cheesy sitcom. Awesome idea actually

Dude, you seriously need to get your own forum section for these.
They are amazing!

Also, you should do one of these for every of the theme type skins.
Such as elderwood, reaper, battlecast, arcade, zombie and so on.
Thanks broski! So like a spotlight? I wanted to do something with the project yi and yasuo series.

Yep, like a spotlight in the respective skin categories natural scene. For instance the elderwoods could hang out in a magical forest groove of some sort, the reapers could be reaping, the arcades could be in an arcade, the projects could be in an assembly factory and so on.
> you should make a spy themed one [](https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/40/ff/af/40ffafa3afa0c12cbb143865a82f4124.jpg)
I assigned you a task I thought impossible, and yet you still manage to complete it. no faker play shall ever be comparable to this achievement you made here.
